ARABIC: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: do not then, my Lord, put me among the wrongdoing people!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then do not, O Lord, put me among the sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then do not include me, my Lord, among these wrong-doing people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: exclude me from the unjust people".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore my Lord, do not group me with the unjust.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My Lord! Then, put me not amongst the people who are the wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My Lord! then place me not with the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O my Lord, put me not among the people of the evildoers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My Lord! then set me not among the wrongdoing folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then do not place me, Lord, with the wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: My Lord! then place me not among the wrong-doing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then do not put me, my Lord, among the wrongdoing lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then, O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: My Lord! Then (save me from Your Punishment), and put me not amongst the people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doing)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O my Lord, do not put me among the harmdoing people'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: My Lord, do not place me among the wicked people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:94] my Lord, then do no put me among the evildoing folk’, lest I be destroyed when they are destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (My Lord! then set me not among the wrong-doing folk) do not place me with the disbelieving people on the Day of Badr.
